29100028.幼いアバによれば <kyodai>は なんと\n時を渡り 過去のエテーネ村へ 来:

past!

29100029.……長い語りを終えると <kyodai>は\n深いため息をついた。私は 思いがけ:
...After finishing her long talk, <kyodai>
sighed deeply. I was totally confused by the
unexpected ending.

29100030.時渡りの術などというものが 存在するとは\nとうてい 信じられない。\nだが <:
The existence of a so-called Time-Travel Technique
cannot be, it's unbelievable. But, <kyodai>
insisted it was true.

29100031.過去のエテーネの村へ 着いてから ずっと\n<kyodai>は 元の時代へと戻る:
Ever since arriving at Ethene Village in the past,
<kyodai> continuously wandered, in search
of a way to return to their original time...

29100032.それで 戻る方法は 見つかったのか？ と聞くと\n<kyodai>は さみしそう:
"So, did you find a way to return?", I asked and
<kyodai> sadly smiled and quietly pointed
to the sky.

29100033.雨あがりの空には 美しい虹が 現れていた。\n私が 虹に 見とれていた 一瞬の間:
The rain ceased, and a beautiful rainbow appeared in
the sky. In the split second that I was admiring the
rainbow, the Wandering Alchemist disappeared...

29100034.あの 雨の日に出会った 錬金術師の話は\n本当に 起きたことだったのか。\n<k:
Did the story of the alchemist we met on that rainy
day truly happen? Who in the world was <kyodai>?

29100035.私は 今でも 雨の日がくると\nさすらいの錬金術師 <kyodai>の\nあの:
I—even now—when a rainy day comes, recall the
Wandering Alchemist <kyodai>'s sad smile...
